title.rendered: QHSE department awards TTE’s Facilities Management Team

content.rendered:
TTE’s QHSE department felicitated its Facilities Management (FM) employees with the ‘Health, Safety & Environment Excellence’ certificates. The event was part of TTE’s newly launched Health, Safety & Environment (HSE) Awards Program, aimed at recognizing the contributions of individuals for their role in improving the company’s overall HSE performance.

The award seeks to promote a positive health and safety culture among employees. Dilip Sharma, Executive Vice President – TTE handed out the certificates, congratulating winners and encouraging others to adopt safe and healthy work practices.
